description: 12-minute PowerPoint presentation on key geological aspects of a chosen ore deposit based on scientific articles. Presented in Week 10 with deposit selection in Week 2.

Analysis and description of ore suite specimens from various deposit types, requiring submission of 10 ore suite summaries with critical literature reviews. Runs from Week 1-8 with final submission in Week 9.
Use of mathematics and Excel to analyze commodity trends and calculate mine profitability. Completed after a compulsory tutorial with 2-week submission window.
Identification of economic minerals in hand-specimen and under microscope, plus interpretation of ore samples' mineralogy, structure, and formation context. Conducted during Week 9 lab class.
